title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Forgive yourself if you feel exceptionally self-indulgent today. Although you may possess a natural impulse to try to shake yourself into productive action, surrendering to your feelings might make more sense now. Of course, you cant afford to be lazy if you have tons of responsibilities on your plate. Nevertheless, even a short rest can be physically restorative and nerve settling. Knowing when to take a break enables you to get more work done in the long run. But first things first: chill, then see if you can heat things up. An old Russian proverb teaches, Without rest even a horse wont gallop. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
